resources.string:
About.

This app is using Machine Learning model to recognize some skin diseases including:
		Acne
		Skin allergy
		Nail fungus
		Hair loss
Also the app will tell you if you have healthy skin.

Features.

With this app you can:
• Using phone camera you can easily determine if you have some skin problems.
• Read useful info.
• You can save your diagnosis as a history.
• Need to visit a doctor? Using the app - make an appointment and attach your history. Also as a reminder you can add a note to your newly created appointment.
